org.dhbw.geo.database

Class DBConditionTime

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dhbw.geo.database.DBObject
      • org.dhbw.geo.database.DBCondition
        • org.dhbw.geo.database.DBConditionTime

  • public class DBConditionTime
extends DBCondition
    A time condition is a set of times or timeframes which are observed.
    Author:
    Matthias

    • Constructor Detail

      • DBConditionTime

        public DBConditionTime()

      • DBConditionTime

        public DBConditionTime(long id,
                       java.lang.String name,
                       long start,
                       long end)
        Creates a new time condition. Use this to create time conditions fetched from the database.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the time condition
        name - the name of the time condition
        start - the start time of the time condition in milliseconds
        end - the end time of the time condition in milliseconds

    • Method Detail

      • selectAllFromDB

        public static java.util.ArrayList<DBCondition> selectAllFromDB(long ruleId)

        Parameters:
        ruleId - the id of the rule
        Returns:
        an arraylist of the time conditions

        Parameters:
        id - the id of the condition time
        Returns:
        the condition time fetched from the database
